attributes.title: Please delete the app
attributes.review: This app is horrible it makes my phone crash and has horrible internet it takes up so much data and isn’t even related to trump. I hate this app do not get it I hope it gets taken down

attributes.title: this app ruined my life😣😭😤😢😣😫
attributes.review: VERY BAD, everyone in my family left me because of this app and I didn’t even do anything wrong I didn’t even press into the app when I downloaded yet. it’s so stupid and retarded🗑🗑🗑🗑🗑🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 oh and i’m also doing this because you’re banning Tiktok so I’m just trying to make your app banned too🤚🏻😌

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app to see the Cheeto and it just continued to crash and lag my phone! So obviously I wish I could put no stars, also, black lives matter

attributes.title: It’s very poorly made
attributes.review: I am in shock by how terrible this app is made. My phone has crashed multiple times, even while I’m on other apps. How am I supposed to even support this very very obviously good man of america. If I can’t even get the app to work! This is disgusting- you have all the time in the world to try and ban twitter an d tiktok but not better your own app. Mr. Cheeto sir I would like to speak to your developer because this is just awful.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review:
WHY DOES HE NEED MY PHONE NUMBER!!!

I didn’t want to give out my phone number with all these tik Tok kids hacking into systems and such, but I can’t support the orange president without it 🤬🤬🤬🤬 I really wanted to keep up with information on the greatest president but it keeps crashing and asking for my phone number and other stuff

attributes.title: Best App for the Greatest President
attributes.review: Away with fake news and fake reviews!  In spite of all the negative reviews, this App prevails as a WINNER just like President Trump!  For the CCP mainlanders and the extreme left, stay clear of this app.  You dont have the intelligence to operate it!
